name: Bubble Trouble (itch) (crew7studiogames)
description:
BUBBLE TROUBLE

This is a replica of the Bubble Trouble game.

FEATURES : 

  • Random PowerUp spawner spawns power ups for  New Life and Rapid Fire
  • Can Jump on to platforms and shoot

CONTORLS : 

  • Use A/D or Left/Right arrows to Move
  • Use Space to Jump
  • Use Left Ctrl or Left mouse button to Fire
  • Press P or ESC to go to Pause menu

Goto my Github page to download the project link - Github Project

Thanks to Brackeys tutorial - https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=4jGVesn7O4g&list=PLPV2KyIb3jR5RwVEjFCiN5BvK3Quqgv_M&index=4
